datasets.name: _metadata.all_models
sample_queries:
-- Select all records
SELECT * FROM _metadata.all_models LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: master.indicators
datasets.description: Unified master table combining all indicator sources into a single comprehensive dataset.

columns.name: indicator_id
columns.business_meaning: Unique identifier for the indicator metric being measured

columns.name: country_id
columns.business_meaning: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code for geographic identification

columns.name: year
columns.description: Reference year for the data point
columns.business_meaning: The calendar year for which the data point is recorded

columns.name: value
columns.business_meaning: The numeric measurement or observation for the indicator

columns.name: magnitude
columns.business_meaning: Scale or order of magnitude for the value (e.g., thousands, millions)

columns.name: qualifier
columns.business_meaning: Additional context or quality notes about the data point

columns.name: indicator_description
columns.business_meaning: Human-readable description of what the indicator measures

physical_properties.transformations_of_raw_data: Union of all source indicators with source tracking

sample_queries:
-- Select all records
SELECT * FROM master.indicators LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: sources.wdi
datasets.description: World Development Indicators (WDI) from the World Bank's comprehensive development database.

columns.name: country_id
columns.business_meaning: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code for geographic identification

columns.name: indicator_id
columns.business_meaning: Unique identifier for the indicator metric being measured

columns.name: year
columns.description: Reference year for the data point
columns.business_meaning: The calendar year for which the data point is recorded

columns.name: value
columns.business_meaning: The numeric measurement or observation for the indicator

columns.name: magnitude
columns.business_meaning: Scale or order of magnitude for the value (e.g., thousands, millions)

columns.name: qualifier
columns.business_meaning: Additional context or quality notes about the data point

columns.name: indicator_description
columns.business_meaning: Human-readable description of what the indicator measures

physical_properties.transformations_of_raw_data: Pivoted from wide to long format, enriched with series metadata

sample_queries:
-- Select all records
SELECT * FROM sources.wdi LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: sources.sdg
datasets.description: This model contains Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) data for all countries and indicators.

columns.name: indicator_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the indicator
columns.business_meaning: Unique identifier for the indicator metric being measured

columns.name: country_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the country
columns.business_meaning: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code for geographic identification

columns.name: year
columns.business_meaning: The calendar year for which the data point is recorded

columns.name: value
columns.description: The value of the indicator for the country and year
columns.business_meaning: The numeric measurement or observation for the indicator

columns.name: magnitude
columns.description: The magnitude of the indicator for the country and year
columns.business_meaning: Scale or order of magnitude for the value (e.g., thousands, millions)

columns.name: qualifier
columns.description: The qualifier of the indicator for the country and year
columns.business_meaning: Additional context or quality notes about the data point

columns.name: indicator_description
columns.business_meaning: Human-readable description of what the indicator measures

physical_properties.transformations_of_raw_data: indicator labels and descriptions are joined together

sample_queries:
-- Select all records
SELECT * FROM sources.sdg LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: sources.opri
datasets.description: OPRI (Operational Performance and Risk Indicators) data for institutional performance monitoring.

columns.name: indicator_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the OPRI metric
columns.business_meaning: Unique identifier for the indicator metric being measured

columns.name: country_id
columns.business_meaning: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code for geographic identification

columns.name: year
columns.business_meaning: The calendar year for which the data point is recorded

columns.name: value
columns.business_meaning: The numeric measurement or observation for the indicator

columns.name: magnitude
columns.business_meaning: Scale or order of magnitude for the value (e.g., thousands, millions)

columns.name: qualifier
columns.business_meaning: Additional context or quality notes about the data point

columns.name: indicator_description
columns.business_meaning: Human-readable description of what the indicator measures

physical_properties.transformations_of_raw_data: Raw operational data aggregated and standardized

sample_queries:
-- Select all records
SELECT * FROM sources.opri LIMIT 10;
